title: RP Purchase South Africa
body:
Hi.
I purchased RP before via airtime  deduction. and prices was still in Rand. Now its only Dollars. Apparantly Boku is no longer so is there  any way i can stil puchase RP.{{summoner:12}}

replies.body: Our billing team might have more context on this, and could help find some options for you.  Submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look at your specific case individually.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can.
